attributes.action: Critically re-appraise UK laws on internet pornography to date.
attributes.additional_details:
Gail Dines noted in The Guardian, July 2nd 2010: 'There are legal sites that feature hardcore images of extremely young looking women being penetrated by older men, with disclaimers stating that all the models are 18 and over.  Dines is clear that regular exposure to such material has an effect of breaking down the taboo about having sex with children.'
This Wikipedia link considers a notable example:
HTTPS://en.m.wikipedia.org/Max_Hardcore.
attributes.background: I've had a pornography addiction in the past.  Recently, I have been doing research on laws surrounding the issue.  To my shock, I have found that 'violent child themed pornography' is perfectly legal.  I have also found an issue regarding the definition of 'rape' in pornography.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
